Posts.Content: Oct 22, 2012 07:18PM gernie wrote: Hi, yes i have crps (pmps)...had bilat mast w/recon a year ago. Had lots of burning/sensitivity in chest/implant area. Neurontin and lyrica are the first line drugs for this. See a pain management doctor... Also lidoderm patches help too...helpful for wearing clothes. I'm not totally better yet, but have improved over time. Good luck to you!:)
Posts.Title: RSD aka CRPS Marciw gernie
